steps.title: Playfair's Wheat
steps.text: This tutorial will introduce you to some fundamental workflows in Lyra which are needed for creating visualizations.

steps.title: Adding Marks
steps.text: As you saw in the Introduction, Marks act as visual building blocks for any visualization in Lyra. For this tutorial we'll be relying on the Rect mark, so to begin, add a Rect to the visualization.
steps.help: Marks are located in the Toolbar above the visualization canvas. Click on a specific Mark to add it to the visualization.

steps.title: Adding Data
steps.text: All visualizations in Lyra need backing data, for this tutorial we'll be employing a dataset inspired by William Playfair's famous "Playfair's Wheat" visualization. The dataset can be found at this url: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/vega/vega-datasets/gh-pages/data/wheat.json, load the corresponding data using the Pipeline Modal's url field.
steps.help: Marks are located in the Toolbar above the visualization canvas. Click on a specific Mark to add it to the visualization.
